name: Avatar
tooltip: Increases health by <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterAvatar_Buff.modifiers[0].amount" style="Bold"/>%, gains resilience and an empowered attack that deals <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterAvatar_WeaponDamage.amount" style="Red"/> damage. Lasts <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterAvatar_Buff.duration"/> seconds.
